species.name: archaludon
descriptions: It digs holes on mountains, searching for food. It’s so durable that being caught in a cave-in won’t faze it.
It gathers static electricity from its surroundings. The beams it launches when down on all fours are tremendously powerful.

abilities.name: stamina
abilities.effect: Raises this Pokémon's Defense by one stage when it takes damage from a move.

abilities.name: sturdy
abilities.effect: Prevents being KOed from full HP, leaving 1 HP instead.  Protects against the one-hit KO moves regardless of HP.
